title: Kunjananthante Kada (2013)
overview: Kunjananthante Kada is a 2013 Malayalam drama film written and directed by Salim Ahamed. The film stars Mammootty in the titular role, as a shopkeeper, alongside debutante actress Nyla Usha while Salim Kumar and Balachandra Menon play other pivotal roles. The story is about a small-time shopkeeper in Kannur and his attempt to find his own place in a rapidly changing world.
storyline: For Kunjananthan, his shop is his life. Handed over to Kunjananthan by his father, the shop is owned by Chenoli Nambiar. Nambiar want to sell all the shops in the junction to clear his debts. He can get a good price too but has evict all the shops before he can sell them. All except Kunjananthan is willing to do so. For him the shop us the memory of his father. His obsessive attachment to the shop has even caused a rift between him and his wife. A series of incidents make him realise that there are many other things in life more important than his obsession to the shop...
